results.title: Live Love Laugh Metal Wall Art Sign - Decorative Home Wall Accent - Ready to Hang - Perfect Housewarming Gift
results.description:
QUALITY MATERIALS:  Our metal pieces are made from 16-Gauge, 1/16-inch-thick, laser cut steel plates. The finished product is several times sturdier than comparable items built from less expensive Aluminum Composite Material (ACM) or thinner 20-gauge steels and feels a lot more substantial. It is of the highest quality, will not flex nor break like products made of inferior materials and is covered by a lifetime warranty.

EXPERT CRAFTSMANSHIP:  Each piece is fabricated in the USA in our Native American owned North Dakota based design studio by a seasoned and gifted metal artisan.

GENEROUSLY SIZED:  Made in the perfect size for your individual needs.  Available in 14, 20 and 24 Inch length sizes, this metal piece strikes the perfect compromise between size and style. It will perfectly accent the surrounding decor without an overpowering effect.

BUILT TO LAST:  Coated in a selection of vibrant colors, the metal piece can be easily color matched to the surroundings both indoor or out.

THE PERFECT GIFT:  A truly special and long-lasting way to celebrate any occasion.  The uniqueness, style and durable nature of the product underscores the importance of the event and will last for a lifetime.

results.title: Large Rectangle Primitive Rustic Country Textured Picture in a Dark Wood Frame with the Words Live Laugh Love Separated by Rustic Stars
results.description:
This will add such charm to any home! Live, laugh, love are words to truly live by. The frame is dark wood and the picture is textured. It's painted a rich brown color and the words are an orange color. There are deeper colored orange primitive rustic stars (2) that separate the words. 
There are some signs of aging that adds to its overall character. 
It measures approximately 23.5"×11.5'. It has 2 metal circle hooks on both ends on the back for hanging.

results.title: Yoga Mat Bag Tote Carry All lined cotton print Live Love Laugh Typography, floral, polka dot w/ pockets
results.description:
After making a version of this bag for myself, friends at my yoga studio encouraged me to make more and share these beauties with the world :)

The exterior of this bag is a mid-heavy home decor/canvas weight fabric. The lining is a lighter weight quilting cotton. 

There is one slip pocket and one zipper pocket sewn into the lining along with a cute button and loop closure. The corners are boxed to allow plenty of room for your mat and other belongings. You could easily fit a block and strap on top of your rolled mat.

The finished exterior measures approximately 13" tall x 27" long and is 5" deep.  It is shown in the photos holding  a standard 24" x 68" yoga mat.

I love working with fun prints and love yoga, so I am grateful to be able to create bags for fellow yogis out of these gorgeous fabrics. I hope that these colors and prints lift your spirits and encourage you to get on your mat!

Made with love from my smoke free, pet friendly home.

results.title: Live Laugh Love//Personalised Custom Size and Colour//Removable Vinyl Quotes Stickers//Wall Decal Decoration//Australia Made Post
results.description:
--------Product Description--------

Decals made and posted in Australia.

High quality removable adhesive vinyl stickers 

"Live every moment, laugh every day, love beyond words."

come with transfer films in custom colors, fonts and sizes.

5 years guarantee for indoor using.

3 years guarantee for outdoor using.

They are designed to be applied to any smooth clean internal wall and intended to be used on painted plasterboard walls, but can also be used on just about any clean smooth surface, such as doors, windows and etc.


--------Important Information--------

    Frames, background cardboard and other accessories shown in photos are not included. 

    For custom colored and/or sized items, please contact us to get a quote before purchasing.

    For custom colored and/or sized items, you will be sent a preview of your custom quote after the order being placed. We will modify the design if you are not happy with the preview. Your quote will be made once the preview being approved.

    Decals will be pre-cut (if necessary) to fit the envelope. It will not affect the usage. They can also be dispatched using paper tube without pre-cut. An additional fee will be charged. Please contact us for details.

    Normally, this item will be made and dispatched within 24 hours after payment received. However, please allow up to 48 hours for custom colored and/or sized decals.

    Express post is available after checking out. You will receive the item on the next business day. Express postage is $9.95 ($1 for each additional item).

    Removable vinyl can not withstand high pressure car washing.

    Please avoid wet application to prevent the adhesive becoming milky (crystal etch excluded).


------How do you install a vinyl sticker------

You will need a level, a cloth, squeegee or credit card, and a hair dryer for more advanced installations.

---1. Prepare Your Surface and Decal---

Use a damp cloth to clean your wall. Let the wall dry completely before proceeding. This step is important because walls have dust particles and residue that could affect the adhesion of the wall decal.

You will need to allow a freshly painted wall to cure 2-3 weeks before installing your decal.

Lay your vinyl sticker flat on a hard surface. Use the squeegee to flatten any rolls or wrinkles. Flip it over and repeat the process. If your decal curls up, you can weigh it down with books.

---2. Position the Decal on the Wall---

Use painter’s tape or masking tape to position the decal on the wall. This allows you to preview the arrangement and it’s location on your wall. We also suggest using a level to make sure the decal is straight. If you do not have a level but do have a smart phone, there are several free smart phone apps that will turn your phone into a level.

After you have achieved your desired placement of the decals, place a long strip of tape across the middle of the shortest distance of the decal(s). Then remove any additional tape that was used for previewing the arrangement.

---3. Transfer the Decal to the Wall---

With the decal taped to the wall, slowly peel the backing paper away from one side. The vinyl should stick to the transfer film on top. Peel until you reach the center and then cut away the backing paper. (It helps to have a friend to help with the cutting but it is not necessary.)

---4. Smooth the Decal---

Using the squeegee or a credit card, start from the center and use a smooth and firm motion to burnish the decal onto the wall.  Slowly work your way from the center to the outer edge of the decal. Remove the long piece of tape and repeat the process on the other side.  Remember to work from the center outward to avoid air bubbles.

Note: If your walls have a texture on them, your decal may adhere better if you wrap your squeegee in a soft cloth. The cloth will help press the decal into the nooks and crannies of the wall texture.

---5. Remove the Transfer Film---

The decal is now on the wall, but the transfer film is covering it. Begin at one of the top corners and SLOWLY peel/roll the film down onto itself and away from the decal.

Be careful not to peel the film away at a 45-90 degree angle as this will pull the decal away from the wall.  If any part of the decal begins to come off the wall, stop and rub the transfer film back down on that section with your squeegee or fingers until that portion of the decal adheres.

Note: If the transfer film won’t release the decal onto your wall, take a damp sponge onto the back of the paper to moisten it and help release the adhesive.

---6. Special Considerations---

The Weather: In extreme weather conditions vinyl might not apply as well on exterior walls or in places like a garage or tool shed. Vinyl applies best in temperatures between 60-80 degrees. If the surface is too cold, the vinyl may not stick well, and the cold temperature could cause vinyl to tear. Usually in a home this is not an issue. But, if your wall feels cold when you touch it, you may want to warm up the room first.

Wall Texture: These stickers are designed to stick to any non-porous paint (they stick best to semi-gloss but they also stick to matte and high-gloss paint). They stick best to smooth surfaces. They may not stick well to highly textured surfaces. Try your test decal first to make sure it will stick to your wall. To achieve the best adhesion possible on a textured surface, after you remove the transfer tape, use your fingers or a soft cloth to very gently run the decal into the grooves of your texture.

For more complicated textures or decals, use a hair dryer on (very) low to soften the adhesive while pushing it into the grooves.


--------Delivery--------

We offer free Standard Post within Australia only. All the items will be posted by Australia Post through Standard Post for free within 24 hours after payment received (excludes weekends and public holidays).

Express Post is available and costs start from $9.95. Please select express post after checking out if you would like to purchase express postage.

You will receive the items on the next business day after purchasing express postage if your location is within Australia Post next day guarantee network, Outside of this network, Express Post items will be delivered as fast as possible using existing transport links.

------Standard Delivery Timetables------

---Delivery within Victoria---

Within metropolitan areas of Melbourne, or within the same city or town or an adjacent city or town in Victoria  2-3 business days

Between a metropolitan area of Melbourne and a country location 3-4 business days

Between country locations 3-5 business days

---Delivery to Sydney, Canberra and Adelaide---
3-4 business days

---Delivery to Brisbane and Tasmania---
4-5 business days

---Delivery to other capital cities---
5-7 business days

Please note: One or two business days delay may occasionally happen especially in the first week before and after long breaks e.g. Easter, Christmas and etc. We highly recommend you to purchase Express Post if the estimated delivery date is close to the day that the items must arrive. Appreciate for your understanding.

Please make sure your postal address is correct before making any payment. If the item is returned to us by Australia Post due to incorrect postal address, postage will be charged for a second delivery or only partial refund can be issued if you would like to cancel the order. If the item get lost due to incorrect postal address or no one claiming for it, no refund can be issued.


--------Returns & Refund--------

Please contact us before returning the items. Returned items must be returned within 30 days of the ship date received. Returned items must be unused with all original tags/labels attached.

If you request a refund, the purchase price will be refunded to you through PayPal, once we have received the returned item and confirmed that it meets conditions above. Please note Express Postage (if applicable) can not be refunded if your reason for returning is "Change My Mind".
You are responsible for any costs associated with returning the item to us if the reason for returning is "Change My Mind". If something is faulty or incorrectly described (we apologize), we will refund the purchase price and Express Postage (if applicable) and the return costs are on us.

results.title: Today I Will Marry My Best Friend The One I laugh with live for dream with Love Rustic Style Wedding Decor Sign. We personalize free
results.description:
"Today I will marry my best friend, the one I laugh with, live for, dream with, Love." This rustic style sign is perfect for a wedding gift or wedding decor. The bride and groom will love this sign for years and years to come. 
 
This sign measures approximately 7.25 x 12 inches and is on 3/4 inch wood. Signs are shown in Brown/SkyBlue. 
We offer several different signs in our shop so be sure to check our Wedding section, so you get the one that is the perfect fit for you. 

• Shipment is generally 3 to 5 business days.
• Hanger attached on backside for easy hanging.
• Several other color options available in drop down selection. The first color will be the color of the text & second color will be the background.
• Hand painted laser engraved creation is made to order.
• If we are shipping directly as gift, we can enclose a small handwritten note card, be sure to let us know what you want the card to say in the NOTES section when you order.

• For PERSONALIZED signs or signs you want modified please put the information in the NOTES section when you place your order.

• PROCESS Our handcrafted creations are made using a 7 step process to create a beautiful expression to be cherished for years to come. Two contrasting colors of paint are applied, the design is laser engraved, a fine hairline is applied to the design which gives an awesome touch. The final touches are completed once it goes through our antiquing process with edges distressed.

• COLOR We have a variety of color choices, but if you don't see what you are looking for, please ask  & we will see if we can make it happen for you. Keep in mind when selecting the color options, the first color is the text color, while the second color is the background. See policies for additional questions/clarification on colors.

• Please note these signs are not massed produced but each is unique and no two are exactly the same.

• When working with wood and the antiquing process, each sign has its own warmth and charm. While we try to get the best wood at the lumber yard, sometimes there will be knots or other slight imperfections in the wood, this is considered adding character to the rustic style of this line of our signs. Thanks for stopping by our shop and please do not hesitate to ask any questions.

 
	Check out our other items in our store 
 	https://www.etsy.com/shop/ExpressionsNmore?ref=si_shop

Color Samples can be seen in a variety of sizes at  https://www.expressionsnmore.com/color-examples-rustic-laser-engraved/

results.title: Today I Marry My Best Friend.. The one I LAUGH with LIVE for and DREAM with wood wedding sign.. 16 in x 16 in.
results.description:
Today I Marry My Best Friend.. The one I LAUGH with LIVE for and DREAM with wood wedding sign.. 16 in x 16 in.  

MAKES a great gift for the Bride..


This sign says it all.. It measures 16 x 16 in.. 


The color choice is for the background... Message me if you don't see your wedding colors listed.

THE COUNTRY NOOK
 signs, chalkboards, and checkerboards are 
hand painted, stenciled, sanded
and finished. We sand the edges of the sign to give it a more rustic look but if you would prefer not to have the edges sanded just let me know at checkout. We protect all of our signs with a Poly Acrylic Matte finish. A saw tooth hanger is attached to the back for easy hanging. If you wish to use your sign as a shelf sitter let me know at checkout and I will not attach a hanger.


We use a variety of woods such as (Ash, Poplar, and Pine) which we purchase from several local sawmills in NY..
All of our signs are made from wood. The beauty of working with wood is that each piece has its own distinct character. No two signs will be the same and will vary according to the distressing and depending on the grain of the woods. We do not attempt to cover up knots, grains or other things that natural real wood have. We feel it adds to the beauty and uniqueness of the sign .It adds to the true look of 
Primitive handmade products. 


I AM ADDICTED TO STENCILS!!!! 
I currently have over 500 sayings and our list keeps growing. Please check back often
as we add new products frequently. 

All sign are Made to Order and will ship within 2-3 weeks of order checkout.. depending on the time of year.


We hope you enjoy them as much as we have enjoyed making them! Thanks for looking!

The patch can be ironed on

All my computerised embroidery is designed and embroidered by me in-house! I take custom orders, drop me a message if you have anything in mind!

results.title: Live Love Laugh Print Inspirational Quote Black And White Large Digital Print Modern Art Printable Wall Decor Heart Print Instant Download
results.description:
► THIS IS AN INSTANT DIGITAL DOWNLOAD, printable in standard frames sizes.

Print instantly at home OR take the files to your local printer/photo printing shop like Office Depot or Target. You can also upload online to a printing service such as Shutterfly.com where you may choose a photographic print or have a bit of fun and get it printed onto canvas, mugs and much more and simply have it delivered to you.

NO PHYSICAL PRODUCTS WILL BE SHIPPED this is a digital file only.

------------------------------------------------------------------

►WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE

The listing includes 4 files including a printing instructions sheet.

Title: "Live Love Laugh"

#1- 8"x10" JPG 300 dpi

#2- 11"x14" JPG 300 dpi

#3- 16"x20" JPG 300 dpi

#4- Instruction sheet RTF

FOR HELP WITH DIGITAL DOWNLOADS, please see the Etsy help article - https://www.etsy.com/help/article/3949

------------------------------------------------------------------

►EXTRA INFO

*YAY NO MORE WAITING FOR SHIPPING! As soon as your payment clears, Etsy will send you your instant download files and donzo! That's it, happy printing!

*This is a digital download print of my original graphic design.

*Have fun with your prints and feel free to get creative with them, you can resize them to your liking. 

*For your 8"x10" print, it has a 8.5"x11" border for easy printing on standard size photo paper. These look great in an 11"x14" mat with an 8"x10" window to fit any 11"x14" frame.

*For your 11"x14" print, these look amazing in a 16"x20" mat with an 11"x14" window to fit any large 16"x20" frame.

*For your 16"x20" print, these look amazing in a standard 16"x20" frame or my favorite is to mat it and go with an XXL frame.

*No physical product will be shipped and the frame is not included. This purchase is for personal use only

*You can get amazing standard size frames at any of your local home decor and craft stores like Michaels and Ikea.

* Colors may vary slightly due to different computer monitors.

* GUARANTEE: Although there are no returns or cancellations on digital download files, I will do whatever I can to make sure I am there for you if anything goes wonky! :-)  

* If you have any questions please scroll down to view my FAQ's section or feel free to email me anytime..:)

Please come visit my original paintings at: https://www.etsy.com/shop/originalmodernart

© Bethany Sky Whitman & Urban Dwelling Gallery All Rights Reserved, these prints are for your personal use only and cannot be used for commercial use or for resale in any way. Original artwork is the intellectual property of Bethany Sky Whitman.
